body.p:
Williamstown Grant Co Ky
Nov 23d 1864
To his Excellency Thos E Bramlet
Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky

The undersigned judge of the Grant county court would most respectfully represent and state that samuel Anderson in the county of Grant and state of Kentucky did killed and murdered G W Osborn on the day of 1865 The undersigned would further represent and state that said murder was committed in cold blood without any provocation whatever That the murdered man was a peaceable Quiet industrius & good citizen of said county & state & was a young man with a wife and some small children and had commenced life with every prospect of succes your Excellency is now informed that said Samuel Anderson has been indicted by the Grant circuit court for the murder of said Osborn a copy of which indictment is herewith sent and that said Anderson has left the state of Kentucky & fled therefrom immediately after the murder was committed by him you are now most respectfully requested to offer a liberal reward for the opprehenso of said Anderson I am sir your obt servt
M Burnett presiding Judge of Grant County
Petition to The Governor for a reward for samuel Anderson
